area_width.description: Determines the width of the area.
area_width.markdownDescription: Determines the width of the area.

area_height.description: Determines the height of the area.
area_height.markdownDescription: Determines the height of the area.

heightmap.description: If specified, the location will be anchored to the of the specified surface of the world.
heightmap.markdownDescription: If specified, the location will be anchored to the of the specified surface of the world.

attempts.description: Determines how many attempts the entity should be teleported to a random location. Defaults to `area_width` * 2 + `area_height` * 2.
attempts.markdownDescription: Determines how many attempts the entity should be teleported to a random location. Defaults to `area_width` * 2 + `area_height` * 2.

landing_block_condition.description: If specified, the entity will only be teleported on top of a block that fulfills this block condition. Otherwise, the entity will only be teleported on blocks that blocks movement/have solid collision.
landing_block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the entity will only be teleported on top of a block that fulfills this block condition. Otherwise, the entity will only be teleported on blocks that blocks movement/have solid collision.

landing_condition.description: If specified, the entity will only be teleported to a location if the entity fulfills this entity condition. Otherwise, the entity will only be teleported to a location that is empty (e.g: no blocks and fluids.)
landing_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the entity will only be teleported to a location if the entity fulfills this entity condition. Otherwise, the entity will only be teleported to a location that is empty (e.g: no blocks and fluids.)

landing_offset.description: Determines the offset of the location of where the entity will be teleported. If the X and Z offsets are specified, the X and Z coordinates of the location will be divided (floored) before applying the offset.
landing_offset.markdownDescription: Determines the offset of the location of where the entity will be teleported. If the X and Z offsets are specified, the X and Z coordinates of the location will be divided (floored) before applying the offset.

loaded_chunks_only.description: Determines whether the entity should only be teleported in loaded chunks. **It is recommended to keep this set to `true` for performance reasons.**
loaded_chunks_only.markdownDescription: Determines whether the entity should only be teleported in loaded chunks. **It is recommended to keep this set to `true` for performance reasons.**

success_action.description: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the entity after it's been successfully teleported to a random location.
success_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the entity after it's been successfully teleported to a random location.

fail_action.description: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the entity upon failing to be teleported on a random location.
fail_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this entity action will be executed on the entity upon failing to be teleported on a random location.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/random_teleport)

Teleports the entity to a random location within the specified area.

Type ID: `origins:random_teleport`
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/random_teleport)

Teleports the entity to a random location within the specified area.

Type ID: `origins:random_teleport`
